channel.title: ConvergingCadence on A J Greengrove's Site
channel.description: Recent content in ConvergingCadence on A J Greengrove's Site

item.title: Exploring "Angels Carried Me Away"
item.description: Angels Carried Me Away: choral style improvisation with the guitar = PITA.

item.title: Exploring "Autumn Moon Dance"
item.description: Autumn Moon Dance: This dance-like motive unfolds in a “minor-variant romanesca”.

item.title: Exploring "Wherever The Wind Takes Me"
item.description: Arpeggiating a single motive results in a deceptively simple prelude. Let’s delve into this audio dungeon - timestamps as a map, motif as a compass.
